The Artist once again emerges from the CR Chamber.....he didn't say a
word.....he walked around just staring at everyone....fnally, he stared at
Plintissa......he then turned and stared around at nothingness......... "hi,
Liono! what's up, bro!....." he said....he ran and slammed himself into the
wall.....he started to stare at Iron Raptor coldly.......his eyes piercing
through her.......
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, May 07, 2000 1:57 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Nemesis Enforcer/the Oblitercons:
>
> ::Nemesis Enforcer chuckles evily, pulling out his missile launcher and
> firing off a rocket at Cyber Claw's torso::
>
> ::Dark One stood to his feet, a charge in his left hand::
> "Oblitercons, get out your most destructive weapons, and attack the Ark!"
> (Dark One orders his men, throwing the charge at the Ark, which was set to
> explode on impact)
>
> ::Breakdown pulled out his grenade launcher, firing off a grenade that
will
> explode on impact off at the Ark::
>
> ::Pyro fired off five fire balls from his flame cannon, the balls made to
> 'explode' on impact::
>
> ::Hiss tossed a charge set to explode on impact from one hand, and fired
off
> a few fusion blasts off at the Ark (the charge heading for the Ark) from
his
> fusion cannon::
>
> ::Yelling like a psycho, Scavenger got to one knee, putting his rocket
> launcher over his shoulder, firing a rocket off at the Ark::
>
